content: पूरण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पूर्-कर्तरि ल्यु] {@--1@} Filling up, completing. {@--2@} Ordinal (as applied to numbers) (द्वितीय, तृतीय &c.); न पूरणी तं समुपैति संख्या <ls>Ki. 3. 51.</ls> {@--3@} Satisfying. {@--4@} Drawing (as a bow). --णः {@--1@} A bridge, dam, causeway. {@--2@} The ocean. {@--3@} The {%Śālmali%} tree. {@--4@} A kind of medicinal oil (विष्णुतैलं). --णी {@--1@} An epithet of Durgā. {@--2@} The silk-cotton tree. --णं {@--1@} Filling. {@--2@} Filling up, completing; <ls>R. 9. 73.</ls> {@--3@} Puffing or swelling. {@--4@} Fulfilling, accomplishing. {@--5@} A sort of cake. {@--6@} A funeral cake. {@--7@} Rain, raining. {@--8@} Warp. {@--9@} Multiplication (in math.). {@--10@} Injection of fluids (in <ab>Medic.</ab>). {@--11@} Drawing, bending (as a bow). {@--12@} Decorating, adorning.
